title.value: К вопросу прогнозирования производственно-обусловленной заболеваемости в сельскохозяйственных организациях
Forecasting of industrial-depended morbidity in agricultural enterprises
Forecasting of industrial-depended morbidity in agricultural enterprises

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Andrush, V.G., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Modern working collectives of agricultural enterprises, including specialists of different age, social and educational level, represent complicated social systems, requiring the necessity of the development of special methods of the research and forecasting of occupational hazards and professional injuries. The article reveals the predicting issues of professional risks and considers the probability-statistical evaluation of external factors of the industrial environment. Analysis of the risks may be carried out with the help of such characteristics as frequency of occurrence of professional injuries and occupational hazards of varying severity. The research presented in the article suggests the model of multi-level system of occupational risks management allowing integrating of offered sub-system into the general system of work safety on agricultural enterprise.
